item.title: November 2023 Broomhill Community Council meeting
item.description: The November meeting was held 08/11 at Broomhill Primary School.

item.title: October Broomhill Community Council AGM and meeting
item.description: The 2023 AGM was a meeting where the community council was re-elected.
